item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, December 25, 2024 at 3:20 AM UTC
item.description:

25. Court of Milan orders Cloudflare to block ‘piracy shield’ domains, IP addresses (120 points | 127 comments)

27. Ask HN: Programmers who don't use autocomplete/LSP, how do you do it? (276 points | 520 comments)
28. My Colleague Julius (487 points | 98 comments)
